## \_Math.bound property

Bound a value in to a range.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly bound: typeof mathBound;
```

## Remarks

NaN input will cause a debug error.

See [mathBound()](./rc-js-util.mathbound.md)<!-- -->.
